name: Yeebo
description: Our extensive menu of over 300 dishes is the quintessence of traditional Chinese cuisine. The menu offers a wide range of dishes from nutritious Hotpot to Dimsum, and signature roasted dishes such as Pecking duck, roasted goose, top-of-the-range abalone, and cheese baked lobster just to name a few.

name: Coco Ichibanya
description:
'CURRY HOUSE CoCo ICHIBANYA',known as 'CoCoICHI', is a chain restaurant specializing in Japanese-style curry rice. 
 Many people enjoy making their very own CoCoICHI curry by customizing the rice portion, spice level, and optional toppings coming in nearly 40 varieties. Please enjoy our curry, which is very popular with the Japanese people!

name: Banh Cuon Song Moc
description: Starting from 1954, this eating point has become unreplacable breakfast places for Vietnamese. This eating place is not only for Saigon visitors to taste, but is also a memorable place about a simple breakfast of Saigonese.
address: Hẻm 132 Vườn Chuối, Phường 4, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

name: Hu Tieu Toan Quan
description: The first impression when first coming to Toan Quan is a spacious as well as tidy place. Besides, the restaurant service is flexible and versable. With only 3 main types of Vietnamese noodles, the customers can choose the suitable option with their taste: pork bone, chicken, or even mixed taste.
address: 99 Đề Thám, Phường Cô Giang, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam

foodList.name: Phnom Penh Noodle Soup - Hu Tieu Nam Vang
foodList.description: Pounds pork bones (neck, spine, or leg), dried squid (2 ounces total), dried shrimp, yellow onion, yellow/golden rock sugar (about 1 ounce), salt, pork loin, pork liver, Crispy Caramelized Shallot (reserve the cooking oil for cooking the garlic), Canola or other neutral oil, finely chopped garlic, ground pork, black pepper, dried tapioca stick noodles or dried fettucine- size flat rice noodles (bánh pho), jumbo shrimp, Chinese chives, Chinese celery, bean sprouts (about ⅓ pound), hot Thai or serrano chiles, limes
